nodes.text: An Aleena child lived on the planet of Aleen during the events of the Clone Wars around 21 BBY.

During the Mission to Aleen, this Aleena welcomed the Galactic Republic clone troopers into his village along with the rest of the villagers. After the troopers arrived, Commander Wolf sent a team of two troopers along with astromech droid R2-D2 and a couple of Aleena, including this child, to repair and survey the local Republican communication station that was affected by an earthquake.

After the station was fixed, this village child along with two other Aleena showed R2-D2 and C-3PO a hole in the ground that led to the Aleena underworld, but a groundquake suddenly started and the two droids fell into the hole. An Aleena male then came back to the village to warm the remaining Aleena and the clones to come to their aide. Since the clones could not understand their language, King Manchucho returned with the rest of the villagers and started praying near the site where the two droids had fallen into the ground.

In the end, C-3PO and R2-D2 managed to return to the surface and this Aleena and the rest of the villagers celebrated when they sealed up the crack leading to the underworld. After the two droids departed, this child ran towards R2-D2 and hugged him before bidding farewell to both.
